Package controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminSystem
    Controls the system responsible for admin
    DisplayTradeSystem
    A controller class responsible for displaying trades
    DoActionTradeSystem
    A controller class that effects all actions that can be done to a trade
    GuestSystem
    A controller that handles all guest functions
    ItemSystem
    ig is a gateway that reads and updates information of items ug is a gateway that reads and updates information of users ip is a presenter that is responsible for printing menu in this system im ts the ItemManager responsible for keeping track of all items in the system um is the UserManager responsible for keeping track of all users in the system currentUserId is the userId of the User currently using the system
    LoginSystem
    Controls the system for registering/logging in users, and logging in admin
    MeetingSystem
    MeetingSystem is a controller for Meetings.
    RequestTradeSystem
    RequestTradeSystem is an controller for requesting trades.
    TradeSystem
    TradeSystem is an controller dealing with trades.
    UserSystem
    A controller that controls the system responsible for Users
